description:
Mana`s class has gone to a certain village on an educational field trip. While chasing after a classmate, an old stone monument is accidentally toppled. Afterwards, the classmate falls ill and is hospitalized, and other strange things begin to happen around Mana. Sensing the presence of a huge yokai, Kitaro and the others arrive to find Mana trapped in a mirror! Could it be the work of the Old Man of the Mirrors? Why was Mana taken to the world inside the mirror? When Kitaro and the others find the Old Man of the Mirrors and question him, he attacks them using the mirrors!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 驚異! 鏡じじいの計略
